title: Patch a host
description: updated properties of an existing host

name.description: The name of the host used for the monitoring.

connect.description: The ip address (ipv4 or ipv6) or the FQDN of the host. If cagent is set true this field becomes optional.

description.description: A brief summary what this host does.

active.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of the host.

frontman.description: optional the UUID of a private frontman the host will be assigned to. This is for intranet monitoring. Frontman must be created prior.

customerUuid.description: optional the UUID of a customer the host will be assigned to.

cagent.description: Enable host monitoring by agent. Requires agent installation.

muted.description: If set true no alerts or warning are sent. They appear only on the dashboard.

dashboard.description: Show or hide host on the default dashboard.

snmpCommunity.description: SNMP Community String. Only used for v2.

snmpUsername.description: Username for v3 requires snmpSecurityLevel auth and a password

snmpAuthenticationPassword.description: Authentication Password for v3 requires snmpSecurityLevel and a username

snmpPrivacyPassword.description: Privacy Password for v3 requires snmpSecurityLevel and a username
